Github

Finder-Point

Develope with: PHP Laravel framework, MySQL, SASS

Finder-Point is an online marketplace where people can search for their daily household products and goods and product holder can post their product details with picture and location.

Github

Cholo

Develope with: Javascript, Node.JS, CSS, Firebase

Visit Cholo website

Cholo is a rideshare web application for CNG and TAXI. Users can search for nearby CNG or TAXI drivers for a ride.

Github

Traffic Control System using OpenCV

Develope with: Pyhton, OpenCV, Haar-cascade, NumPy, Aurdino

Realtime roadside CCTV footage steaming and count vechicles. Generate traffic signal through Aurdino.

Github

FAPPS is an online plateform where people can share news and post photo with others.
